QuestData.Title: Stranded at the Marsh
QuestData.Description: The ogres got two of our stagecoaches: this one and one that fell into the marsh just north of here.$B$BI want you to head there and rescue any survivors while we hatch up a plan to deal with these ogres.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue 5 Crash Survivors at the Hailwood Marsh.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done it again, $n. You have my thanks.
